thread.title: Surprisingly quiet given proximity to Times Square
thread.title_full: Surprisingly quiet given proximity to Times Square - Review of Sanctuary Hotel New York, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: CPachon
title: Surprisingly quiet given proximity to Times Square
text: Room is compact but well maintained and very functional. Roof terrace is worth a visit for an appetizer or after dinner cocktail. Parking validation at hotel for independent garage across the street brought it to $40 for 24h. Continental breakfast was :sufficient" We paid $200/night, in March.
